# Wagtail F Richtext

An alternative for the Wagtail `richtext` filter.

## Setup/Installation

Install the package into your python environment.

```bash
pip install wagtail-f-richext
```

## Links

- [Documentation](https://github.com/wagtail/f-richtext/blob/main/README.md)
